DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the ability of integrated MRI/PET to detect and evaluate treatment outcome in HCC patients.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Treatment Response With Integrated MRI/PET in Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: This study using 18F-FDG PET and functional MRI (DCE-MRI, Diffusion-weighted MRI, MR spectroscopy).
DOC.criteria: 1. Prior Informed Consent Form 2. At least one measurable tumor, according to RECIST version 1.1. 3. Age > 20 years. 4. ECOG performance status 0 or 1. 5. Life expectancy > 3 months. 6. Confirmed Diagnosis of HCC 7. Adequate renal function (Serum creatinine â‰¦ 1.5 x upper limit of normal). 1. Age <20 years old 2. Pregnancy 3.
